title: Player bots in Co-Op.
body: These things are killing the experience for me, In the Co-Op Queue sometimes you'll have a teammate that is actually a bot created by a player, While most of them are harmless the AFK and Feeding bots are the most annoying. Is ANYTHING being done to counteract these kinds of bots?

replies.body: what i think is amazing is your 4 farm at 3 minutes {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
